attributes.additional_details:
Petition to stop further islamic faith centres being opened in areas already served by other islamic centres within an already reasonable distance.

Case in point in Birmingham Church Road, Handsworth, former pub called The Endwood with a proposal to covert to an Islamic Centre when already there are numerous in the vicinity aswell as numerous mosques.

This is destroying the multicultural aspect of life in areas and making them muslim only areas aswell as a tax payer subsidised entity.
